nodes.text: The Mandalorian blaster was a slightly more powerful version of the common blaster pistols used in the galaxy. It is believed Bendak Starkiller's blaster was a modified version of this weapon. The Mandalorian Blaster was used extensively during the Mandalorian Wars. These blasters were fairly common throughout the galaxy due to the Mandalorian Wars having taken place on so many worlds. Many of the blasters were found on the market following the end of the wars.
